org.docgene.model

Class XMLImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.docgene.model.AbstractStyledElement
      • org.docgene.model.AbstractJustifiedElement
        • org.docgene.model.XMLImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.docgene.model.Alignment, org.docgene.model.ImageReference, ParagraphElement, StyledElement

    public class XMLImage
extends org.docgene.model.AbstractJustifiedElement
implements org.docgene.model.ImageReference, org.docgene.model.Alignment
    Represent the reference to an image.
